title: "Summoners, the issue has now been resolved."

replies.body:
When i open the LoL launcher i click play and then the client just disappears
Please fix it Riot
the same thing is happening to me. rito plz
well we can log on now :D
I still get the same message, that the login server is unresponsive.

According to the [status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na):
> **Network Operations â€“ 8 minutes ago**
> We are now investigating an issue with games not starting. Ranked are off while we investigate.

Hopefully it'll be resolved soon enough, looks like they got the main problem figured out.
